name: Spinach AI
headline: The AI Meeting Assistant
description:
Spinach AI, backed by Y Combinator, Zoom and Atlassian, is the AI Meeting Assistant - helps run your meeting, summarizes the conversation and automates post-meeting work. Spinach integrates with your existing tools and supports 100 languages.
According to Gartner, 80% of project management tasks will be run by AI by 2030, Spinach is making that a reality today.

founders.name: Matan Talmi, Co-Founder / CEO
founders.description:
Building the AI Meeting Assistant at 🥬 Spinach AI, backed by Y Combinator, Zoom & Atlassian.
2x AI founder

founders.name: Yoav Grossman, Founder - CTO
founders.description: Building the AI Meeting Assistant at 🥬 Spinach AI, backed by Y Combinator, Zoom & Atlassian.

founders.name: Josh Willis, Co-Founder, VP Product and User Experience
founders.description: Love user experience. AI is making this so interesting!

# **Your AI Meeting Copilot**
#### Turning meetings into
# Notes
# Results
# Action
# Insights
Spinach runs your meeting, summarizes the conversation and automates post-meeting work. Supports 100 languages.

**"I've been looking a long time for a tool that sends meeting summaries to Slack, and can also open a ticket in Jira based on the information said in the meeting. And I found it!"**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/64888344435cc1a835d03e6a_Idan%20Shperling.jpeg)
Idan Shperling
CTO, Krayon Digital
**"With Spinach, Zoom conversations instantly turn into clear acton items and Jira tickets, streamlining the team's workflow and accelerating development cycles"**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/65f37aef7c7f197972e05c03_Liron%20Deutsch%20Pic.png)
Liron Deutsch
Group PM, Atlassian
Instant NOTES
Coming soon
## We take notes so you can listen
Spinach is designed specifically for meetings like daily standup, weekly syncs, user research and more. Stay engaged in the discussion, and let Spinach take notes. 
“I don’t take notes anymore during meetings. I get to participate more interactively with the conversation since I’m not trying to type to keep up”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/64887e20192eba4d29d55a83_Mitchel%20Roe.jpeg)
Mitchel Roe
Product Manager, ChatLingual
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/65c633941f1fb43def952a4f_Research%20Template%20Anatomy-v2.png)

ACTIONS + Tickets
## **Never forget the important stuff**
Spinach keeps all your actions in one place and integrates with your product management tool. Turn any action into a ticket. 
“The action items are great. Especially if I’m unable to attend the meeting. I get all the context needed to just go directly have relevant conversations even though I wasn’t there”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/648882bfe6fcc666eddbae11_robert%20knox.jpeg)
Robert Knox
Head of Engineering, Grid Smarter Cities
## Integrations
### Works with your existing tools
Spinach connects to your calendar, joins your video meetings, shares summaries in Slack or email. It even links directly to your board and suggests new tickets based on what you discuss.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/64897c278024709235f2cff4_Zoom.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/64897c2bcd994ba4017faeb8_Meet.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/64897c27762880b3929b30a7_Teams.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/6491d6b3566022cf33360dd5_Webex.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/64897c278a6b10a15a4588bd_Slack.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/64897c25b7a00eb3740585c7_Jira.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/64897c27d4ce35834aa909a9_Confluence.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/64897c2434f4996d88341e97_Notion.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/64897c2562f1d585332d8160_Asana.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/64897c25dcc3977ac06ec92e_Linear.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/648a36247ab2750c7b22178c_Trello.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/648a3624bb2b03f958f3e93a_Clickup.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/67192ef0a90a9c7b6cf89f69_Monday.com.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/67192f1ec3657ce1c14af1a6_Zoho.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/67192f1e5dc992c2ef578323_Hubspot.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/67192f1e9ae15013b68a615e_Attio.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/67192f281511bba51a93b570_Salesforce.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/67192f1ea38828c36a5cdc5d_Zapier.png)
[Browse our integrations](https://spinach.io/</integrations>)
**“I just received a summary from a feedback session we had with the team. The results are perfect. Spinach took note on all the key topics and action items.”**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/65a015029fa23c0c37ab18b5_pablo.jpeg)
Pablo Derendinger
CTO of E-verse
Customization
## Review everything before it's shared
With Spinach, you’re in control of what information gets shared. You can review and edit meeting notes and control distribution. 
"Spinach summaries are easy to navigate, edit, and utilize. We also love sharing it with our clients and prospects as they join meetings with us. The ease of integration has been fantastic."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/65f377743ec059d9f1b2244a_abby%20-%20arc.jpeg)
Abby Marzi
Operations Manager, ARC
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/66b424f91671a4e342e9244f_EditSummaries-v2.gif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/648713f4ebb6e36f3d37b3f1_Square%20-%20Bright%20-%2002.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/648713f486e9f3861fa3d3ea_Square%20-%20Dark%20-%2001.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/648713f490a7efafd96789eb_Square%20-%20Light%20-%2001.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/648713f4ebb6e36f3d37b3f1_Square%20-%20Bright%20-%2002.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/648713f411e52910fe235181_Square%20-%20Dark%20-%2002.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/648713f4d2f51a223dde90b4_Square%20-%20Light%20-%2002.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/648713f4ddeff466f2545e4d_Square%20-%20Bright%20-%2003.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/648713f4ff89b11d469f01e9_Square%20-%20Dark%20-%2003.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/648713f4efc3a938db4f48a2_Square%20-%20Light%20-%2003.svg)
## Ready to give it a try?
Save hours every week on note taking, follow ups, and keeping your board up to date. 
[Get started](https://spinach.io/</ai-setup>)

Instant NOTES

## We take notes so you can listen
Spinach is designed specifically for meetings like daily standup, weekly syncs, user research and more. Stay engaged in the discussion, and let Spinach take notes. 
“I don’t take notes anymore during meetings. I get to participate more interactively with the conversation since I’m not trying to type to keep up”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/64887e20192eba4d29d55a83_Mitchel%20Roe.jpeg)
Mitchel Roe
Product Manager, ChatLingual

ACTIONS + Tickets
## **Never forget the important stuff**
Spinach keeps all your actions in one place and integrates with your product management tool. Turn any action into a ticket. 
“The action items are great. Especially if I’m unable to attend the meeting. I get all the context needed to just go directly have relevant conversations even though I wasn’t there”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/648882bfe6fcc666eddbae11_robert%20knox.jpeg)
Robert Knox
Head of Engineering, Grid Smarter Cities
## Integrations
### Works with your existing tools
Spinach connects to your calendar, joins your video meetings, shares summaries in Slack or email. It even links directly to your board and suggests new tickets based on what you discuss.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/64897c278024709235f2cff4_Zoom.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/64897c2bcd994ba4017faeb8_Meet.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/64897c27762880b3929b30a7_Teams.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/6491d6b3566022cf33360dd5_Webex.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/64897c278a6b10a15a4588bd_Slack.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/64897c25b7a00eb3740585c7_Jira.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/64897c27d4ce35834aa909a9_Confluence.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/64897c2434f4996d88341e97_Notion.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/64897c2562f1d585332d8160_Asana.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/64897c25dcc3977ac06ec92e_Linear.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/648a36247ab2750c7b22178c_Trello.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/648a3624bb2b03f958f3e93a_Clickup.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/67192ef0a90a9c7b6cf89f69_Monday.com.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/67192f1ec3657ce1c14af1a6_Zoho.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/67192f1e5dc992c2ef578323_Hubspot.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/67192f1e9ae15013b68a615e_Attio.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/67192f281511bba51a93b570_Salesforce.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6464e9face9085a673d70327/67192f1ea38828c36a5cdc5d_Zapier.png)

Customization
## Review everything before it's shared
With Spinach, you’re in control of what information gets shared. You can review and edit meeting notes and control distribution. 
"Spinach summaries are easy to navigate, edit, and utilize. We also love sharing it with our clients and prospects as they join meetings with us. The ease of integration has been fantastic."

generated_description:
### Spinach AI: Your AI Meeting Assistant

**Mission**: Spinach AI strives to revolutionize the way meetings are conducted by providing an intelligent meeting assistant that automates the meeting process: running discussions, summarizing conversations, and handling post-meeting tasks. 

**Overview**: Originally founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W22, Spinach AI is an innovative tool aiming to simplify and enhance productivity in meetings. Backed by notable investors like Y Combinator, Zoom, and Atlassian, Spinach supports integration with existing tools and boasts an impressive ability to function in over 100 languages.

**Founding and Team**: Spinach AI was launched with a team of just nine employees in Nashville, TN. With expertise in SaaS, productivity, collaboration, and remote work, the team operates under the insightful guidance of their Group Partner, Nan.

**Context**: There’s a stat that’s hard to ignore—according to Gartner, by 2030, 80% of project management tasks will be handled by AI. Spinach is embracing this future right now, making those predictions tangible.

**Key Features**:
- **Meeting Summaries**: Capture all the key points discussed during meetings.
- **Action Items**: Automatically generate and delegate action items.
- **Ticket Creation**: Convert discussions into actionable project tickets seamlessly.
- **Integrations**: Effortlessly integrate with tools like Jira, Slack, Asana, and many more, making workflows simpler and more efficient.

### Use Cases
Spinach AI caters to a wide range of sectors, including:
- Product Management
- Engineering
- Project Management
- Marketing
- Customer Success
- Sales
- HR and Recruiting
- Finance and Accounting
- Legal & Compliance
- Agencies & Consultants

This versatility allows cross-functional teams to leverage Spinach effectively.

**Why Spinach?**
Users rave about Spinach's ability to streamline their workflows. They appreciate how it captures details during meetings, ensuring that they can stay engaged in discussions without needing to worry about taking notes. As one user put it, “I don’t take notes anymore during meetings. I get to participate more interactively with the conversation since I’m not trying to type to keep up.”

**Security and Privacy**: Spinach AI pledges to maintain enterprise-grade security, prioritizing user privacy and offering features like encryption and zero training use of sensitive information.

**Conclusion**: If you're looking to save time and stay organized during meetings, Spinach AI is head and shoulders above the rest. With its intelligent automation for running meetings and managing tasks, it can transform not just how meetings are run, but also how effectively teams can collaborate and achieve their goals.

**Website**: [Spinach AI](https://spinach.io)
